conclusion: Analyze the flow direction and path of liquid through baffles A, B, C, and D.
Baffle A: Liquid flows from left to right.
Baffle B: Liquid flows from top to bottom.
Baffle C: Liquid flows from right to left.
Baffle D: Liquid flows from top to bottom.
After Baffle A, liquid flows horizontally from left to right.
After Baffle B, liquid flows vertically downward.
After Baffle C, liquid flows horizontally from right to left.
After Baffle D, liquid flows vertically downward.
Liquid starts flowing horizontally from left to right (A), then vertically downward (B), next horizontally from right to left (C), and finally vertically downward again (D).
Horizontal movement cancels out; vertical movement is cumulative, moving downward twice.
Liquid ends up in the lower part of the container.
Liquid will flow into Container E.
